review.title: “Time intensive”
review.pros: Pros – Ability to lead others. Strict procedures. Re-investing in the business
review.cons: Cons – Work/Life Balance is a major con. Not able to be off two days a week. Direct supervisor not able to understand or respect personal goals and other activities
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Try to implement a better work life balance. Rotation of weekends. Supportinmg employees when they are pursuing extra avenues in life
